tips.title: Package Dimensions
tips.content: Enter accurate dimensions to get the best price estimate. Use centimeters for length, width, and height.

tips.title: Weight Matters
tips.content: Accurate weight helps us calculate shipping costs. Use kilograms for weight.

tips.title: Clear Descriptions
tips.content: A clear description helps travelers understand what you're shipping and increases match chances.

tips.title: Quick Responses
tips.content: Responding quickly to messages increases your chances of successful matches.
